column5: I have a friend who has a 1989 Yamaha 40 Hp motor He needs a CDI module and Trigger assembly he has found a 1992 motor for parts but can not find out if the CDI will work from it would anyone here know? He has been looking online for answers but no luck he asked me and I knew where I would have the best luck.  Cheers Mike
Hey mike should  be good to go..both cdi packs have the same # 6H5-85540-02-00..if I remember correctly 89-94 are the same elec system
Thanks for that info I let Tom know hope the parts will be good for him.
Yep, I have the same engine. What NES said.....it will be a yamaha part.  S.
